Headline: #87 87th Temporary Reroute near 87th/Langley
ShortDescription: 87 87th buses temp. rerouted Eastbound 87th, King Drive and 83rd Westbound 83rd, King Drive and 87th: due to, street blockage near 87th/Langley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 87th/Langley, due to street blockage near 87th/Langley.

Eastbound buses will operate via 87th, King Drive and 87th including the normal route streets.

Westbound buses will operate via 83rd, King Drive and 87th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/North
ShortDescription: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ridgeland, North Ave, Austin, Grand: due to street blockage near Narragansett/North.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ridgeland, North Ave, Austin, Grand and the resume their normal route at  Narragansett, due to street blockage near Narragansett/North.

Allow extra travel time.
